titles: An elegy on the much lamented death of Mr. Samuel Loveday who departed this life on the 15th of Decemb. 1677. in the 59th year of his age.
publisher: Printed for Francis Smith, at the Elephant and Castle in Cornhil, near the Royal Exchange.,
notes: Verse: "O heavy stroke! Oh bitter lamentation! ..."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
keywords: Loveday, Samuel, 1619-1677 --  Poetry --  Early works to 1800.
